name: Sopio Scorer
description:
Looking to play Sopio on your iPhone or iPad? Wrong app! Get the other one :)

Love card games? Hate numbers? If you're one of the many unfortunates that can't add or subtract in multiples of fifty, you will no longer be laughed out of the weekly Sopio Super League Championship Tournament because you'll have the Sopio Scorer App - still 100% FREE! Add, subtract, win, lose, laugh, cry - this app can make you do some of these things AND LESS.

Buy the game at sopiocards.com !
